title: Google\Cloud\PubSub\V1\GetSchemaRequest
name: GetSchemaRequest
description:
Request for the GetSchema method.

Generated from protobuf message google.pubsub.v1.GetSchemaRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the schema to get. Format is projects/{project}/schemas/{schema}.

params.name: data.view
params.description: The set of fields to return in the response. If not set, returns a Schema with name and type, but not definition. Set to FULL to retrieve all fields.
